about_the_game:
The amazing soundtrack for Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke. Listen to the fantastic composition by King Aurorus music, combining classic western sounds with modern elements. Feel the heat of the Badlands, or chill out with the vibes of The North Post. Includes all 12 tracks from the game for listening to anytime the mood strikes you.

Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke is a top down action shooter with randomly generated loot, levels, and enemies. Find unique weapons and upgrades to blast, explode, laser, and kick your way through an army of dastardly bandits!

short_description: The soundtrack for the action rogue-like Romanticized Dreams of a Post-Apocalyptic Cowpoke. Enjoy all the riviting music of the post-apocalyptic wild west without the need to worry about being attacked by bandits.
